entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 5.
